title: Airlines Need New Planes, but the Supply Chain Has Other Ideas
description: Supply chain problems hamper Boeing and Airbus as they try to fulfill a spate of orders from carriers seeking to expand and rejuvenate their fleets.
dc:creator: Niraj Chokshi
category: Boeing 737 Max Groundings and Safety Concerns (2019)
media:description: Alaska Airlines, with a big Boeing order, plans to become an all-737 operator by the end of next year.
